Blog.post: Today, I did my laundry AND made my bed. (I never make my bed. Ever.) Yay!
I'm 7. I love the number 7. It is very good. Good, I say. Yes.

La la la connect the dots. Hello, I'm eight. Actually, I'm twenty-four, if we are talking about age. Years, that is...twenty-four years old. My name, however, is eight. Nice to meet you. This is an endeavor. I'm not completely sure of the purpose yet, but that will all be revealed in time. I would like to personally welcome you to RANDOM by seven eight, and I hope you will come back to share in the adventures to come! Have a nice day. ::8::
Dammit, there is something wrong with the blog. Damn blog. Dammit. I want some cheese. Like I didn't buy three different kinds today.
turn around, turn around... there's a thing there that can be found... apartments are cool.
I like orange push pops. They are yummy.

I like to sleep until noon every day, every day, every day. I am a lazy a$$. Lazy. That is me. Lazy eight. BLAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH. Did you say something? I think I'll get dressed now, seeing how it's nearly 3 in the afternoon and I'll feel like a total loser soon if I don't. Winky.

It's no fun when you want to do something with you best friend (8), but she's still asleep, and you have to wait till she gets up. But it's ok, because there's lots of music to listen to, and lots of internet posts to reply to. Dave Matthews Band is the biggest bomb, diddly, yo, in the Universe!

made bacon. smells like bacon. lit candles. smells better. more useful than in the bathroom. ding. I can't wait for 8 to come home. it's more fun when we're hyper together. it's no fun when you're hyper alone. there's no one to laugh at you. that's the key. yo. I love #7.
i removed seveneight cuz it was extraneous. lemme know if this upsets you, yo.
Dude. That's Vanilla Ice , baby. Let's enable the weirdness. Let's unleash it. Baby. This blogger was one of those things in the back of my mind that I forgot how to do. from back in 'da day.

Bing ding ding dinga ling-ling. I think there should be a contest. I'll post bling ding ling instead of the opening riff to a song, and everyone else has to guess what it is. i ♥ eight. I can't believe the last time I posted here I didn't know who CA was. Donuts.
